meanings.definition: Food that is sweet or sugary in taste.
meanings.sent1: I love to indulge in sweets after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps a jar of sweets on her desk.
meanings.sent3: The sweets at the party disappeared in no time!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as the sweets she baked.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked sweets filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment or affection.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always calls me her little sweets.
meanings.sent2: He whispered sweet nothings in her ear.
meanings.sent3: The cat's name was Mr. Sweets, a fitting choice.
meanings.sent4: Their love was as pure as a basket of sweets.
meanings.sent5: She greeted him with a warm hug, saying, 'Hello, sweets.'

meanings.definition: Pleasing to the senses or mind.
meanings.sent1: The sweet melody of the birds in the morning was calming.
meanings.sent2: The flowers emitted a sweet fragrance in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The sweet surprise made her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: Her sweet voice could soothe even the most troubled hearts.
meanings.sent5: The sweet memories of childhood always bring a smile to her face.
